import React from 'react' import { Route, Switch, useRouteMatch } from 'react-router-dom' import { useWallet } from 'use-wallet' import chef from '../../assets/img/chef.png' import Button from '../../components/Button' import Page from '../../components/Page' import PageHeader from '../../components/PageHeader' import WalletProviderModal from '../../components/WalletProviderModal' import useModal from '../../hooks/useModal' import Farm from '../Farm' import FarmCards from './components/FarmCards' const Farms: React.FC = () => { const { path } = useRouteMatch() const { account } = useWallet() const [onPresentWalletProviderModal] = useModal() return ( {!!account ? ( <> } subtitle="Earn SASHIMI tokens by staking Uniswap V2 LP Tokens." title="Select Your Favorite Dishes" /> ) : (
)} ) } export default Farms
